TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class HelpProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class HelpProvider : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider
type HelpProvider = class inherit Component interface IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 提供控制項的快顯畫面或線上說明。

span.span: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個執行個體維護與其相關聯的控制項的參考的集合。Each instance of maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it. 若要建立關聯的說明檔案，將屬性。To associate a Help file with the , set the property. 您指定的呼叫所提供的說明類型方法，並提供指定控制項的值。You specify the type of Help provided by calling the method and providing a value for the specified control. 您提供的關鍵字或主題的說明藉由呼叫方法。You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the method. 若要開啟至特定主題的說明，關鍵字應該格式來傳遞*topicName*.htm。To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm. 若要將特定的說明字串與控制項產生關聯，請使用方法。To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the method. 當使用者按下 F1 鍵，且焦點在控制項時，會顯示快顯視窗中使用這個方法的控制項與相關聯的字串。The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus. 如果未設定屬性，您必須使用方法，以提供說明文字。If the property has not been set, you must use the method to provide the Help text. 如果您已將兩者和 [說明] 字串，說明根據會優先使用。If you have set both and the Help string, Help based on the will take precedence. 呼叫方法上類別來提供說明功能。 calls methods on the class to provide Help functionality. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示包含四個位址欄位的表單上的即時線上說明。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 此範例會使用方法來設定的協助工具提示文字。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 當您使用內容相關的 [說明] 按鈕，然後按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示指定的文字。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為屬性已設定為 mspaint.chm。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to mspaint.chm. 方法呼叫每個地址的控制來識別它有可用的說明內容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

public: HelpProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體類別中，使用屬性，方法，和方法，將關聯控制項的說明主題。Once you have created an instance of the class, use the property, method, and method to associate your Help topics with a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示包含四個位址欄位的表單上的即時線上說明。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 此範例會使用方法來設定的協助工具提示文字。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 當您使用內容相關的 [說明] 按鈕，然後按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示指定的文字。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法呼叫每個地址的控制來識別它有可用的說明內容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在執行階段顯示此說明字串，使用者會按 F1 鍵，而指定的控制項擁有輸入的焦點。To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和類別來篩選輸入。The following code example shows how to use the and classes to filter input. 它也會示範方法。It also demonstrates the method. 這是完整的範例;它已準備好執行之後將它新增至您的專案。This is a complete example; it is ready to run once you add it to your project. span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this object.
The name of the Help file.

value.span: 這可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm 的格式。

span.span: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所擷取的檔案名稱識別，這個物件會提供說明的所有控制項提供說明支援的檔案。The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help. 已編譯的說明 (.chm) 檔案或原始的 HTML 檔案，可以指定這個檔案名稱。This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示包含四個位址欄位的表單上的即時線上說明。The following example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 此範例會使用設定協助工具提示文字。The example uses the to set the Help ToolTip text. 使用內容相關的 [說明] 按鈕，然後按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標，幫助的工具提示出現時使用指定的文字。When using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 當按下 F1 鍵，並在 [位址] 欄位中，將焦點放`mspaint.chm`會顯示說明檔，因為屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。When pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the `mspaint.chm` Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法呼叫每個地址的控制來識別它有可用的說明內容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

span.span: Specifies whether Help is displayed for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您先前稱為或中指定的控制項`ctl`參數，自動顯示該控制項的說明。If you previously called the or for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the automatically displays Help for that control. 若要修改此行為，請呼叫方法中，指定`false`在`value`參數。To modify this behavior, call the method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示包含四個位址欄位的表單上的即時線上說明。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 此範例會使用方法來設定的協助工具提示文字。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 當您使用內容相關的 [說明] 按鈕，然後按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標時，協助工具提示會顯示指定的文字。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 當您按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中時，會顯示 mspaint.chm 說明檔，因為屬性已設定為`mspaint.chm`。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法呼叫每個地址的控制來識別它有可用的說明內容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回字串，其中包含的類型和屬性。The method returns a string that includes the type and the property of the .
